**Validate**

Maintain only the data you need, archive the rest

**CrystalBridge**

# **Migrate**

_Effectively structure and organize your data ecosystem_

##  

## **Tailor your transformation**

Whether you want to move everything to SAP S4/HANA, start fresh, or pick and
choose which elements of your landscape to move over, we can help you map out
your journey. With our powerful data management platform, you can automate the
more tedious aspects of the process, making your project timelines radically
shorter.

##  

## **Make it a silent shift**

Concerned about business disruption? Don’t be. A near-zero downtime move to
S4/HANA is possible. We can guide you through the process, even combining your
move to S4/HANA with a modernization of your core systems, a move to cloud
platforms, and more.

## **CrystalBridge®  **

Analyze, archive, restructure and migrate data securely to new systems or
cloud environments with our powerful data management tool.

Learn more about CrystalBridge Analysis  

### Make your SAP S/4HANA transition smooth and straightforward

Our CrystalBridge platform can make your shift to S/4HANA quick and secure.
Let our experts walk you through how we automate many of the tedious tasks in
transformation, which can drastically shorten your project timelines.

### Book your demo now

# SNP Offers Solution Packages for Moving to the Cloud

Heidelberg / Germany, May 3rd, 2021 – SNP Schneider-Neureither & Partner SE, a
world-leading provider of software solutions for digital transformation
processes and automated data migrations, has developed new solution packages
for moving SAP landscapes to the cloud in a simple and predictable manner. The
cloud migration packages are based on the data transformation platform
CrystalBridge®, which automates the migration of SAP systems to the cloud,
therefore providing a fast and secure move. The packages include all costs
that are necessary for a successful data migration – software licenses and
consulting services – and the fixed price ensures highly reliable planning. In
addition, the packages enable a particularly fast move to the cloud thanks to
SNP’s flexible, software-based approach: Depending on the complexity and
requirements, the time between the performing the assessment and gaining
access to the migrated SAP systems in the cloud is often less than six months.

5/2/2021  |  3 min

### Topics

  * Press release

### Share news

The three cloud migration packages are designed for different scenarios with
varying complexities. The first package enables a 1:1 migration of SAP
landscapes to the cloud (“lift and shift”) along with the necessary SAP
upgrades of the ECC systems, operating system and database changes, and even
Unicode conversions. The other two packages offer a selective data migration
to the cloud and a migration to SAP S/4HANA in a cloud environment,
respectively. In addition, companies have the option to add downtime
optimization and the creation of a proof of concept for a test system. If
additional functions are required, the packages can be supplemented with
further services and software modules from SNP. SNP offers each package in
four different sizes, depending on the system size and number of users. The
offer is aimed at both direct customers and partner companies, which can
include the packages in their offerings.

“Our cloud migration packages enable customers and partners to move to the
cloud quickly, securely and in a highly automated manner with CrystalBridge®,”
says Michael Eberhardt, CEO of SNP. “According to its size and objectives, we
offer each company the ideal solution package at a fixed price. In this way,
customers benefit from highly reliable planning and won’t experience any
unpleasant surprises during the project. We are convinced that this will give
many companies exactly the security they need to take the step into the
cloud.”

“Our primary goal in developing the cloud migration packages was to provide
customers and partners with quick and easy access to SNP solutions,” adds
Oliver Schwede, General Manager Central Europe at SNP. “Partners can
seamlessly integrate these packages into their own offerings to provide users
with an optimal end-to-end solution. At the same time, customers benefit from
a fast, secure and highly automated migration to the cloud with the data
transformation platform CrystalBridge®. This provides a manageable path for
moving to the cloud.”

For more information visit www.snpgroup.com/en/sap-cloud-migration/packages .

* * *



**About SNP**

SNP is a world-leading provider of software for managing complex digital
transformation processes. Instead of traditional IT consulting in the ERP
environment, SNP offers an automated approach using specially developed
software: The Data Transformation Platform CrystalBridge® and the SNP
BLUEFIELDTM approach allow companies to restructure and modernize their IT
landscapes much more quickly and securely as well as migrate to new systems or
cloud environments more securely. This gives customers clear qualitative
advantages while at the same time reducing their time and costs.

The SNP Group has around 1,400 employees worldwide. The company is
headquartered in Heidelberg, Germany, and generated revenues of around EUR 143
million in the 2020 fiscal year. It serves multinational companies in all
industries. SNP was established in 1994, went public in 2000, and has been
listed in the Prime Standard segment of the Frankfurt Stock Exchange since
August 2014 (ISIN DE0007203705). Since 2017, the company has been trading as a
European company (Societas Europaea/SE).

3/27/2024  |  3min

## SNP Expects Further Increase in Revenue and Earnings in 2024 after Record
Year with Strong Software Growth

Heidelberg, March 27, 2024 – SNP Schneider-Neureither & Partner SE, leading
global provider of software for digital transformations, automated data
migrations and data management in the SAP environment, can look back on a
successful 2023 fiscal year and has posted significant growth rates for all
key financial indicators: The order entry volume is 37% higher year-over-year
and amounts to € 266.1 million (2022: € 193.6 million). Revenue increased by
17% to € 203.4 million (2022: € 173.4 million). Both SNP’s service segment
and, to an above average extent, its high-margin software business have
contributed to this growth. EBIT rose by 64% to € 11.1 million (2022: € 6.8
million). The EBIT margin increased by 1.6 percentage points to 5.5%. The
currency-adjusted EBIT improvement would be around € 11 million higher than in
the previous year. SNP’s successful business development is a result of
operational and strategic measures which will also drive profitable growth in
2024 and beyond.

2/27/2024  |  3min

## SNP appoints Phillip Miltiades as President of the Asia-Pacific region
continuing its global growth strategy

Heidelberg, Germany I Singapore, February 27, 2024 – The Heidelberg-based
software and consulting company SNP SE is continuing its strategic
transformation. The leading provider of software for digital transformation,
automated data migration and data management in the SAP environment has
appointed Phillip Miltiades as the new President and Managing Director of the
Asia-Pacific region. Effective immediately, the former SAP manager complements
and strengthens the SNP executive leadership team, bringing decades of
delivery experience and industry knowledge as well as extensive go-to-market
expertise encompassing sales, partner management and operations. Phillip takes
over from Alexander Arnold, who has held the position as Managing Director of
the region on an interim basis since September 2023 and is returning to his
global role as Chief Revenue Officer full-time.

Read more

2/6/2024  |  3min

## Loh Services trusts in SNP software for comprehensive SAP project

Heidelberg, Germany, February 6, 2024 – Heidelberg-based software and
consulting company SNP Schneider-Neureither & Partner SE, a leading provider
of software for digital transformations, automated data migrations and data
management in the SAP environment, has been tasked with implementing a
comprehensive SAP project at Loh Services GmbH & Co. KG. Loh Services is the
internal IT service provider of the Friedhelm Loh Group. Headquartered in
Haiger in the state of Hesse, the global family-owned company has over 12
production locations, more than 95 international subsidiaries and over 12,000
employees. One of the companies in the Friedhelm Loh Group is Rittal, a
manufacturer of enclosures, power distribution technology, climate control
solutions and IT infrastructure. The pioneering project with Loh Services
kicked off in October 2022, starting with an extensive system analysis as the
foundation.

Read more
